participant_1.background:
I am a powerlifter who loves the cold.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
i have one grandson and one daughter.
i work in a circus as a juggler.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
my favorite drink is cuba libre.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I'm trying to get into the gambling business, like my father.

content.text: Howdy, what do you enjoy doing for fun?
I enjoy playing concerts. I played one last night, and I was a bit nervous about what people would think of my outfit, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
Sounds great! I love live music! What was your favorite song you played?
I really enjoyed playing my own song that I wrote, but I also really enjoyed playing "Cuba Libre" by The Strokes.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've never heard of "Cuba Libre" before, but I'll have to check it out!
It's a great song! You should also check out my song, it's called "The World is Yours".
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I'm a powerlifter, and I also like to read the news and write my own stories.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I've never met a powerlifter before.
It's a lot of fun! I've been doing it for a few years now, and I've really enjoyed it.
I bet! It sounds like a great way to stay in shape.
It is! I definitely recommend it.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime!
I'd love to see you at the gym sometime!
Sounds good! I'll keep an eye out for you
